text: Opel Meriva was a car produced by the German carmaker Opel from 2002 to 2017. It is sold as the Vauxhall Meriva in the United Kingdom. It entered its second generation in 2010. It has rear hinged back doors refered by Opel to as "FlexDoors". In 2017, the Meriva was replaced by a crossover SUV model called the Crossland X. ==Different versions== File:Opel Meriva front 20071126.jpg|First Generation File:Opel Meriva B front 20100723.jpg|Second Generation Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Meriva
title: Opel Meriva
